Package gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddVoice
    Dialog window to add a new voice to the balance
    The dialog contains two spinners - one for the date and one for the amount - and a text field to insert the description
    BalanceTableModel
    Table model that displays an archive of Voices on a JTable
    ComboBoxListener
    Listener of the JComboBox in the MainWindow
    DateDialog
    Dialog window that lets the user apply a filter to a table, basing on a start date and an end date.
    DateRowFilter<M,I>
    Filter that extends a RowFilter, it is used to filter a table to let see only the values with a date between the minimum and the maximum
    FileChooser
    Lets choose a file from the file system and shows a confirm window if the user chooses to save on a pre-existing file
    MainWindow
    Main window, containing: JTable with balance voices JComboBox to filter the balance voices in the table JMenu to save, search, print and export JButton to add and remove balance voices
    MenuActionListener
    Listener for the menu of the MainWindow, executes the action chosen by the user
    SearchDialog
    Dialog that allows to make incremental searches on the balance table
    TableAmountRenderer
    Renderer of the table, allows to change the colour of the cell's text if a row is a revenue or a loss
    WelcomeScreen
    Welcome screen where the user can choose if: Create a new balance Load a pre-existing balance Exit
